entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • RemoteSymbolFinderService gold bars with missing required document #63682
    17.4
  • New Inline Rename Checkboxes close session when clicked #63676
  • Source-build behavior control update #63667
    Backlog
  • Show embedded language classification in syntax visualizer #63664
    Backlog

Closed

  • WorkspacesNetCore.MetadataReference should not need to wait for all asynchronous operations #34264
  • Test plan for "Attributes on Main for top level programs" #57047
    17.4
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-32830.180 #63678
  • Incorrect CS8166 when calling [UnscopedRef] method to assing to a scoped local #63524
    17.4
  • Raw string literal with `u8` suffix, either and/or editor and compiler parsing issue #63669
  • 'Introduce local' CodeAction in 'async Task' ArrowExpression adds invalid 'return' keyword to new method body #61796
    Backlog
  • BadImageFormatException for abstract static from non-generic interface #63617
    17.4
  • Consider consolidating CA1801 and IDE0060 #63641
    17.4
  • Unclear stack state for unconditional branches #63564
  • Build fails for transitive nuget references, introduced in 17.3 #63596
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-32829.245 #63659

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix completion service for providers with text view roles #63685
    Area-IDE
  • Ensure we look for source-generated documents when making an OOP call #63683
    Area-IDE
  • Re-introduce main-vs-deps #63680
    Area-Infrastructure
  • break integration tests into three phases to better measure them #63677
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Method group defaults #63673
    Area-Compilers
  • Add feature to recommend making a struct 'readonly' when all its fields are already readonly. #63668
    Area-IDE
  • Fix race condition in analyzer driver for computing nodes to analyze … #63665
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers
  • fix incorrect variable name #63663
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Make IPreviewService async, or synchronous with threading requirements #63661
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Fix potential deadlock if we are previewing a rename change #63652
    Area-IDE, Approved to merge
  • Convert workspaces and new document formatting integration tests to new framework #63610
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Skip compiler-only changes for corehost pipeline #63684
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to release/dev17.4 #63670
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Restore focus to the textview after rename #63660
    Area-IDE, Approved to merge
  • How to debug bootstrap failure locally #63681
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #63679
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Update CodeAnalysis.Testing dependency #63416
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Run 'make struct readonly' on IDE code #63674
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Run 'make struct readonly' on compiler code #63675
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Enable nullable in C# keyword recommenders and their tests #63639
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Install 3.1 runtime during official builds #63672
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #63671
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Do not return awaited void task in "Introduce local" refactoring #63385
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.2 to release/dev17.3 #63632
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Semantic Snippets - Class Snippet #63402
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Remove the single-symbol assumption in ConflictResolver Session #63150
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #63662
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #63649
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Delete publishing steps that are no longer needed #63651
    Area-Infrastructure, Next

Updated

  • Provide way to dynamically create builtin-operator symbols off of a compilation #63408
    Area-IDE
  • Deprecate usage of Workspace in TextLoader (breaking change) #63616
    Area-IDE, Needs API Review
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #63687
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to main #63686
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Support RefSafetyRulesAttribute for interop with existing assemblies #63461
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Account for using declarations in nested switch statement gotos #63655
    Area-Compilers
  • Don't include syntax tree's contents when throwing NFWs #63653
    Area-Compilers
  • Update 17 3 packages #63599
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Produce warning on duplicate analyzer references #63264
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • File types EE support #62812
    Area-Compilers
  • Move to platform background work indicator #63629
    Area-IDE
  • Editorconfig diagnostics #63580
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Support changing return types of methods, properties, events #63486
    Area-Interactive
  • Refactoring constructor initializers to use primary constructors #63648
    Area-IDE, New Language Feature - Records
  • Support rename and resolve multiple symbols in one solution snapshot #63588
  • First Draft of Common Language Server Protocol Framework (CLaSP) #62924
    Area-IDE, Needs API Review
  • Report an error for an unsupported type tests involving 'ref' structs. #63646
    Area-Compilers
  • Allow adding `scoped` or removing `[UnscopedRef]` for override, interface implementation, or delegate conversion #63656
    Area-Compilers
  • Add ChecksumAlgorithm to project snapshot #62840
    Area-IDE, Needs API Review
